p.k: From hippie havens like Zipolite to the uber luxurious retreats of Careyes and El Tamarindo, we show you the Mexican Pacific like you’ve never seen it before. En route Charlie checks out one of Mick Jagger’s favourite holiday havens, shows us how to make and more importantly, how to drink tequila, feeds a pack of wild crocodiles and helps liberate hundreds of baby turtles.
